definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

pinyin: dian4 nao3 duan4 ceng2 sao3 miao2

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾溫承認工作人員無法用掃描儀監控所有物品。

sentences.english: The slit scanning is required to obtain two-dimensional spectral imaging.
sentences.chinese: 爲了得到像斑的二維光譜，需要做狹縫掃描。

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法對68例兒童白瞳症患者進行雙眼CT掃描檢查。

sentences.english: Daily or weekly scans can be scheduled also.
sentences.chinese: 也可以設定隔天或隔週掃描。

sentences.english: For ease of installation, there’s really nothing that beats Barcode Scanner.
sentences.chinese: 安裝條碼掃描器很簡單，沒有任何困難。

sentences.english: A full-body CT scan gives a radiation dose of 20-30 millisieverts.
sentences.chinese: 一次全身CT掃描的輻射劑量是20～30毫希弗。

sentences.english: I instrumented the server source code to obtain the packets scanned counter.
sentences.chinese: 我測試了服務器的源代碼以獲得掃描包的計數器。

sentences.english: The glass also must be cleaned after each scan.
sentences.chinese: 每次掃描後，還得清理玻璃板。

sentences.english: Metrologic shop for computers and bar code scanners to read product reviews.
sentences.chinese: 店內碼捷儀器硬件和條碼掃描器讀取商品評論。

sentences.english: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.chinese: 氚肺掃描可能有助於早期診斷吸入性損傷。

sentences.english: You have stated that you will scan e-mail in order to target advertisements based on its content.
sentences.chinese: 你們說你們會掃描郵件然後根據郵件的內容派送廣告。

sentences.english: I suppose the scanner hates me.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這臺掃描儀老跟我作對。

sentences.english: A method is reported for the detection and analysis of saccharin concentration indrinkables by dual-wavelength UV scan.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用雙波長紫外掃描法測定飲料中糖精鈉的含量。

sentences.english: STM is a low coast A. S. K. SAW transmitter module.
sentences.chinese: 掃描隧道顯微鏡是一種低海岸調幅聲發射模塊。

sentences.english: The method has been applied in mechanical scanning antenna servo system.
sentences.chinese: 該方法在機械掃描天線伺服系統中得到了一定的應用。

definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
